DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: LODI, G. L.;G Lodi;LODI, G;LODI, GIOVANNI;LODI, G.

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui graduaчуo em Odontologia na Universita degli Studi di Milano e Doutorado no University College London - Eastman Dental Institute for Oral Health Care Scienc. Щ atualmente Professor/Pesquisador do Departamento de Medicina Oral da Universidade de Milуo e colaborador/editor de revisѕes sistemсticas, do Cochrane e tem experiъncia nas сreas de condiчѕes malignas e prщ-malignas da mucosa oral; lэquen plano bucal e condiчѕes liquenoides; manifestaчѕes orais relacionadas com condiчѕes sistъmicas e tratamentos mщdicos.

OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES: Laboratory experience Optical and scanning electron microscopy. Immunohistochemistry, immunofluorescence and other immunological techniques (Western Blot, immunoblotting ). Basic molecular biology techniques (polymerase chain reaction, reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction). Member of the European Association of Oral Medicine Part Time Librarian of the library of the Eastman Dental Institute (1997) PhD External examiner Facultad de Medicina y Odontologia, Universidad de Santiago de Compostela, Spain (2003) PhD External examiner UCL, University of London (2010) Translator of numerous books from English to Italian Supervisor of about 20 DDS thesis for the University of Milan
